author: cgoodale
msg: Cleaned up a lot of commented out code, and swapped around the gridBox implementation.  This is a temporary fix.  Later on we need to work toward creating a standard gridBox for the processing if a user selects: Model, Obs, or User grid options.

author: cgoodale
msg: RCMES-91:  Cleaned up metrics.py.  Mike Joyce cleaned up this file a couple times and did a great job with it. I downloaded and applied his patch from Review: https://oodt.jpl.nasa.gov/review/r/126/ (patch 3).
This means we can close out the review request.

author: cgoodale
msg: res.wkWidth and res.wkHeight were being referenced before res variable was created, so I moved them down a bit.
Added back in the contour map creation.  Somehow it was eliminated during the code merge on accident, so that has been corrected now.

author: cgoodale
msg: Moved the GridBox object logic further down into the code, since it is only needed if working on a User Defined grid.  Otherwise we would use the Model grid.
This type of switch statement really should be handled back in the rcmet.py code during config parsing.

author: cgoodale
msg: Minor tweak to a print statement.
